about.title: About me
about.presentation: Hey, my name is Corentin and I'm 20 years old.
about.study: Currently, I'm studying for a BSC. Computer Science at the <0>IU International University of Applied Sciences.</0>.
about.lang: My main programming language is <0>Golang</0> but I've also worked with java, python, typescript, C/C++ and more.
about.database: I also have experience with databases such as PostgreSQL or MongoDB and I'm familiar with Docker, Docker Compose and even Podman.
about.opensource: Furthermore, I'm a passionate open-source enthusiast and have been contributing to several projects for a few years now. I've also created <0>Memnix</0>, a free and open-source flashcard app for Android and Web.
about.community: I like to manage communities and I'm currently the founder of <0> The Kafejo </0> a Discord community for developers and students.
about.chess: You might also meet me on a chess board as I'm playing a lot and I'm managing a chess community for my friend <0>Stouuf</0> on Discord, Twitch and YouTube.
about.linux: I'm also a big fan of Linux and I've been using it since my youngest age. At the moment, I'm using <0>OpenSuse Tumbleweed</0> as my main operating system and <1>Void Linux</1> on my laptop.
about.code: I'm also a freelance backend developer and I've been working on several projects for the past years.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.memnix: Memnix is a project that aims to create tools to facilitate learning for students by working in an organized way. It's using its own spaced repetition system to allows students to create and share their learning materials.
projects.gauntlet: Gauntlet reborn is a project that aims to create a new version of the arcade game Gauntlet from the 80s.
projects.uca_edt: A simple project to help UCA (Université Côte d'Azur) students to have a better view of their schedule and to be able to export it to their calendar.
projects.kitsu: Kitsu is a multi-purpose discord bot that generates stats for your discord server to help you increase the activity and grow quicker.
projects.stouuf: This is a website I made for Stouuf, a french chess coach. It's a simple single page website to help him promote his courses and find new students.
projects.echiquier_nicois: This is a website I made for my chess club.
projects.description: Here are some of my projects.

contacts.name: Name

introduction.title: I’m Corentin Giaufer Saubert. I'm 20 and I live in Nice.
introduction.content_a: When I'm not coding you can find me on the chessboard or soaring high on the wings of a TIEgit  to follow my never-ending quest of finding The Little Prince.
introduction.content_b: I'm also passionate about cinema; be it films, series or anime! In the time that remains, I enjoy playing the piano and training for volleyball...
introduction.content_c: My love for chess goes back to my childhood. At first I was discovering the game and playing casually, but soon found myself hungering for more and thus I ended up joining a club. Not too long after I was competing in the French championships.
introduction.content_d: After having practiced competitively well into my teenage years, I am currently focusing on training to improve my understanding of the game.
introduction.content_e: I also contribute to various chess platforms and communities and I'm currently a Twitch moderator for Chess.com.
introduction.content_f: For as long as I remember the The Little Prince held a special bearing in my heart. A story so simple yet so layered, so childish yet so subtle. A story that has colored my dreams ever since I read it. The Little Prince became a guiding star in my sky.
introduction.content_g: That is how I first came into contact with the world of aviation, which I later on fell in love with.
introduction.content_h: My interest unwavering across the years, I started taking flying lessons during adolescence, and am currently in the process of completing my PPL (Private Pilot's License).

work.title: I code for a living but also as a passion
work.content_a: Currently, I'm studying for a BSC. Computer Science at the IU International University of Applied Sciences..
work.content_b: I'm also a freelance backend developer and I've been working on several projects for the past year including websites and web applications...
work.content_c: My main programming language is Golang but I've also worked with java, python, typescript, C/C++ and more.
work.content_d: I also have experience with databases such as PostgreSQL or MongoDB and I'm familiar with Docker, Docker Compose and even Podman.
work.content_e: I'm also a passionate open-source enthusiast and have been contributing to several projects for a few years now. I've also created Memnix, a free and open-source flashcard app for Android and Web.
work.content_f: I like to manage communities and I'm currently the founder of The Kafejo a Discord community for developers and students.
work.content_g: I'm also a big fan of Linux and I've been using it since my youngest age. At the moment, I'm using OpenSuse Tumbleweed as my main operating system and Fedora on my laptop.

talks.title: I participated in several talks and have been interviewed for different podcasts.
talks.description: I've been part of talks and podcasts — such a blast! Being live on stage, the energy, the vibe — it's like we're all in it together. And podcasts? They're my sweet spot. It's not just opinions; it's a genuine conversation, and that's where the real magic happens. Can't wait to share stories and laughs with you!

stouuf.description: Corentin took care of creating my website as well as everything I needed in terms of graphics, audio, and more. His work is very clean, and on top of that, he is very friendly, attentive, and available.

freelance.title: I materialize dreams into reality.
freelance.description: I'm a freelance backend developer and I've been working on several projects for the past years.
freelance.backend_description: Experienced in Golang backend development, I focus on creating robust solutions. Utilizing Docker for seamless deployment and management, I navigate databases like PostgreSQL and MongoDB to optimize your application's data handling.
freelance.frontend_title: Precision-Crafted Websites: Astro and Vue Development
freelance.frontend_description: Dedicated to crafting precise websites, I specialize in Astro and VueJS. Experience the fusion of innovation and functionality for an exceptional online presence.
freelance.maintenance_description: Ensuring enduring excellence, I offer maintenance services. Entrust your digital infrastructure to my meticulous care, enjoy the peace of mind that comes with a well-maintained digital infrastructure.
